property.name: Rules
property.value: Fight - Public - Craft +4 : Attacker : If you win this mission, you may place a number of Activiation Tokens equal to your leader's expense, divided as you choose, on an y of your inactive leaders. : Defender : If you win this mission you may place a number of Activation Tokens equal to your leader's expense, divided as you choose, on any of your inactive leaders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fight - Private - Charisma +3 : Attacker : If yo uwin this mission, gain 2 Victory Poitns or give an opponent -3 Victory Points. This cannot reduce a player below zero Victory Points. : Defender : If yo uwin this mission, gain 2 Victory Points or give an opponent -3 Victory Points. This cannot reduce a player below zero Victory Points.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chase - Public -Transport +5 : Attacker : If you successfully perform four Mission Trasnport actions, you immediately win the mission. All actions performed by your agents have +1 TN at this mission. : Defender : After each time an enemy agent successfully performs a Mission action, increase the TN for all actions performed by enemy agents at this mission by 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intrigue - Public -Comabt +4 : Attacker : After each time a non-Exposed agent becomes Exposed or baffled during this mission, give that agent aBullet token and remove all otherBullet tokens fro mthe game. : Defender : After the Attacker and Defender pass consecutively, retire any agent with a Bullet token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intrigue - Prviate - Charisma +4 : Attacker : Effects that would expose an agent or that would result in an agent being considered Exposed at this mission wound that agent as well as producing their normal effects. : Defender : Effects that would expose an agent or that would result in an agent being considered Exposed at this mission wound that agent as well as producing their normal effects.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chase - Prviate - combat +5 : attacker : If you win this mission ,search your Agency Deck for up to one Unique card and up to one non-Unique card, reveal them to your opponents and put them in your hand. : Defender : If you win this mission, you may retire the Attacker's active leader.
